## Mixin() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Mixin<T1, C1, T2, C2, T3, C3, T4, C4, T5, C5>(m1: C1 & Cls<T1>, m2: C2 & Cls<T2>, m3: C3 & Cls<T3>, m4: C4 & Cls<T4>, m5: C5 & Cls<T5>, ...mn: Array<Cls<any>>): Ctor<T1 & T2 & T3 & T4 & T5> & C1 & C2 & C3 & C4 & C5;
```

|  m4 | C4 &amp; Cls&lt;T4&gt; |  |
